byline.contributor: Ihsanullah Tipu Mehsud contributed reporting from Islamabad, and Zia ur-Rehman from Karachi, Pakistan.

abstract: Posters calling for Pakistani Army chief Gen Raheel Sharif to take over country appear in several areas, sparking rumors of military coup; posters are work of Move On Pakistan, obscure political party that distrusts civilian leadership.
lead_paragraph: The signs, placed by Move On Pakistan, call on the popular general Raheel Sharif to take over for an increasingly unpopular prime minister.

headline.main: Posters in Pakistan Urge a General to Take Control of the Government
headline.print_headline: Posters in Pakistan Urge General to Take Control of Government

snippet: The signs, placed by Move On Pakistan, call on the popular general Raheel Sharif to take over for an increasingly unpopular prime minister....

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
keywords.name: subject
